tokens.resolved_gloss: a foreign nation; hence, a Gentile; also (figuratively) a troop of animals, or a flight of locusts
tokens.translation: a foreign nation; hence, a Gentile; also (figuratively) a troop of animals, or a flight of locusts

tokens.resolved_gloss: great (in any sense); hence, older; also insolent
tokens.translation: great (in any sense); hence, older; also insolent

tokens.resolved_gloss: to kneel; by implication to bless God (as an act of adoration), and (vice-versa) man (as a benefit); also (by euphemism) to curse (God or the king, as treason)
tokens.translation: to kneel; by implication to bless God (as an act of adoration), and (vice-versa) man (as a benefit); also (by euphemism) to curse (God or the king, as treason)

tokens.resolved_gloss: to be (causatively make) large (in various senses, as in body, mind, estate or honor, also in pride)
tokens.translation: to be (causatively make) large (in various senses, as in body, mind, estate or honor, also in pride)

tokens.resolved_gloss: an appellation, as a mark or memorial of individuality; by implication honor, authority, character

tokens.resolved_gloss: to exist, i.e. be or become, come to pass (always emphatic, and not a mere copula or auxiliary)
